```{r, include=F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=F, message=F, warning=F, error=F)
# Let's pull the nms4r package from github, but only if it isn't already installed. We don't want to
# pull the package unnecessarily as github allows a max of 60 unauthenticated requests per hour.
ip = installed.packages()[,1]
if (all(ip!="nms4r")){
  library(devtools)
  devtools::install_github("marinebon/nms4r")
}
```
